# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-102">Confirmările de citire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-103">Pentru a solicita o confirmare de citire sau o confirmare de livrare pentru mesajul în Outlook pe web:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-104">Selectaţi trei puncte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-105">în partea de sus a mesajului compune panoul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-106">Selectaţi **Arată opţiuni ale mesajului**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-107">Selectaţi **Solicitare confirmare de citire** sau **solicită o confirmare de livrare**, sau ambele.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-108">Pentru a alege modul în care Outlook răspunde pentru a citi primire cereri, du-te la</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-109">**Setări** > **Vezi toate setările de Outlook** > **mesaj de manipulare**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fe6e0-110">Pentru informaţii suplimentare, consultaţi [confirmările de citire din Outlook pe web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fe6e0-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
